price: E clamarão: "Ó Malik! Que teu Senhor nos ponha termo à vida!" Dirá ele: "Por certo, aí, sereis permanentes!"
arabic: وَنَادَوۡاْ يَٰمَٰلِكُ لِيَقۡضِ عَلَيۡنَا رَبُّكَۖ قَالَ إِنَّكُم مَّٰكِثُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wanādaw yāmāliku liyaqḍi ʿalaynā rabbuka qāla innakum mākithūna
